name: Herb
description: The Medicinal Herb restores 20 to 35 of your Hit Points.

name: Wings
description: The Wings of the Wyvern, thrown up into the air, will transport you home.

name: Torch
description: Carry several to illuminate caves once you begin to travel.

name: Dragon's Scale
description: The wearer of this scale receives an extra measure of protection (+2 defense).

name: Fairy Water
description: A vial of the magical water keeps enemies at bay for a short time while you travel.

name: Key
description: Locked doors can be opened only with these magic keys.

name: Ball of Light
description: A powerful relic from an earlier time when the world was bright.

name: Erdrick's Tablet
description: Hidden for ages, the tablet holds Erdrick's words of advice.

name: Fairies' Flute
description: The music of this instrument can cast certain evil beings (The Golem) into sleep.

name: Silver Harp
description: A dangerous item to obtain, but you must in order to complete the quest. Summons an enemy when used.

name: Staff of Rain
description: The magic of this item is not at first clear. Listen to clues to understand.

name: Stone of Sunlight
description: When paired with the Staff of Rain a potent magic is unleashed.

name: Gwaelin's Love
description: You must have some direction to your quest. Gwaelin's love is your compass.

name: Erdrick's Token
description: The warrior who discovers this object thereby proves his heritage.

name: Rainbow Drop
description: He who carries the Rainbow Drop may reach an island without a ship.

name: Cursed Belt
description: Not all treasure is good. This belt will squeeze you like a vise. Don't put it on; just take it and sell it. If you wear it anyway, you cannot enter Catle Tantegel (or get expelled immediately if revived) and sometimes miss turns during combat. To remove the curse, speak with the old man in Brecconary Town to remove the items.

name: Death Necklace
description: Buried and difficult to find, the evil necklace will bring a good price at a tool shop.

name: Fighter's Ring
description: Due to misprogramming, the ring does nothing. It's otherwise claimed to increase your fighting ability (most common claims being +2 attack or increasing critical hit chance.)
